items.sentence: I think that Tom didn\'t know that Mary spoke French.
Don\'t you think we\'ll find what we\'re looking for?
No matter how rich you are, you can\'t buy true love.
I think it was strange that Tom didn\'t say anything.
I\'d like you to send this package for me right away.
I\'m looking forward to touring bookstores in the US.
I don\'t think it\'s anything we need to worry about.
The vending machine sometimes doesn\'t work properly.
There\'s no way that Tom will ever be able to juggle.
He ran so fast that they couldn\'t catch up with him.
I know Tom doesn\'t like Mary, but I don\'t know why.
I\'ll come to Boston and help you with your research.
I\'ll use the wood I got from Tom to make a bookcase.
I think it would be better to do this some other way.
Tom told me that he would like to visit us in Boston.
I think that it\'s dangerous for children to do that.
Because of the rain, we had to eat our picnic inside.
Children like to pretend to be adults when they play.
If you want Tom to respect you, you must respect Tom.
Tom wanted to know who was going to help him do that.
